titles.title: A bill to clarify oversight and jurisdiction over the regulation, inspection, and labeling of cell-cultured meat and poultry, and for other purposes.
Cell-Cultured Meat and Poultry Regulation Act of 2019
Cell-Cultured Meat and Poultry Regulation Act of 2019
Cell-Cultured Meat and Poultry Regulation Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
